## Resources

- [ggplot2: Elegant Graphics for Data Analysis](https://ggplot2-book.org/) 3rd edition
- [Fundamentals of Data Visualisation](https://clauswilke.com/dataviz/)
- [R Graphics Cookbook](https://r-graphics.org/) 2nd edition
- [R for Data Science](https://r4ds.hadley.nz/) 2nd edition 
- [R4DS Online Learning Community](https://rfordatasci.com/)
- Ask questions on [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/r) or [Posit Community](https://community.rstudio.com/).

## Local Resources

- [R-Ladies Canberra Meetup](https://www.meetup.com/rladies-canberra/)
- Ask the local experts such as at the 
  - [BDSI Drop-In Sessions](https://bdsi.anu.edu.au/news-events/event-series/bdsi-bioinformatics-and-statistics-drop-sessions) and 
  - [ANU Statistical Support Network](https://services.anu.edu.au/business-units/research-initiatives-and-infrastructure/statistical-support-network).
- [Online Statistics Courses](https://services.anu.edu.au/training/online-statistics-courses#overlay-context=business-units/statistical-consulting-unit)  by ANU Statistical Support Network
- [R Project Sharepoint Resources](https://anu365.sharepoint.com/sites/StatSupportoNline/SitePages/R-Project(1).aspx?promotedState=0) by ANU Statistical Support Network
- You can continue to use the [ANU Learning Data Slack Community](https://anu-bdsi.github.io/training-R1/#slack) to connect with each other.
